title: [Illithien Aerie, Snowcap Atrium]
description: An arching, engraved copper entryway stands watch over the immense atrium, whose pale marble floor is inlaid with rings of concentric copper and jade to form a complex mandala.  Starlight speckles the floor as it filters through rose-hued window panes, while lit copper braziers keep the shadows at bay.  Twin staircases curve invitingly upward to meet in a broad balcony.  Tapestries provide a discreet screen to the hallway beyond.
